Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: EAMON CS 1.6 GENERAL HELP.

1. Commands may be abbreviated on the left or right side. Examples: "A DR" or "A GON" for ATTACK DRAGON, "REQ RAY FROM AL" or "REQ GUN FROM IEN" for REQUEST RAY GUN FROM ALIEN, "PUT PUM IN LAR" or "PUT PIE IN OVEN" for PUT PUMPKIN PIE IN **045

2. Sometimes items may be in a room but won't show up until you EXAMINE them. Pay close attention to all descriptions. Note: LOOK only repeats the room description and -nothing- else. Use EXAMINE to, well, examine things. **046

3. Before you can manipulate items that are inside of, under or behind other items, you must REMOVE them from that item. There is no REMOVE ALL command, but if you ATTACK a (breakable) container, all of its contents will be emptied to the **047

4. Type SAVE and a number for a desired save position to Quick Save (save without having to verify). Adding a description will rename that slot. Examples: "SAVE 2" or "SAVE 5 Dark Room (NO GRUES)". Also works with RESTORE. (Type RESTORE 1, etc.)

5. You can INVENTORY companions (normally anyone whom, when you SMILE, smiles back at you) to see what they are carrying and wearing. You can then REQUEST those items from them. You can also INVENTORY certain containers to get a list of contents.
6. If you GIVE food or a beverage to a friend, they will take a bite or drink and give it back to you.

7. To give money to someone, type GIVE and an amount. For example, GIVE 1000 TO IRS AGENT would pay 1000 gold coins to the nice IRS Agent. In most standard adventures, if you GIVE 5000 or more, a neutral monster will -usually- become your friend.
8. The POWER spell has been known to have strange and marvelous effects in many adventures. When all else fails (or just for fun) try POWER.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: EAMON CS 1.6 NEW COMMANDS.
1. The GO command allows you to travel through any door/gate you encounter, including those that are free-standing (not associated with a room directional link).

2. The SETTINGS command allows you to change a variety of configuration options, which are persisted across saved games. The settings available and their effects on gameplay can vary between adventures, so trying this command is usually helpful.

3. The LOOK, EXAMINE, REMOVE and PUT commands have been enhanced to work with prepositions. You can LOOK or EXAMINE [in|on|under|behind] [container] to get a list of contents and then REMOVE or PUT [item] [in|on|under|behind] [container] **048

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: Where are all the commands that exist in other Eamon CS adventures?

1. The ECS engine has been enhanced with classic Eamon DDD5 support. This mode is intended to reproduce the gameplay experience for really old Eamons, and one element of that is a restricted command set.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I find the secret doors and artifacts in this game?

1. You must LOOK at the room while not in combat to discover its secrets (possibly multiple times; a random element affects your likelihood of success). Additional hints will give you specific answers!
2. In the hall which bends to the south and east there are cracks on the north wall; this is evidence of a secret door.
3. In the temple of Ngurct proper, there is another secret door which leads south.
4. If you LOOK in the mummy room you will uncover a hidden scarab!
5. If you LOOK in the room where the torture chamber guard is killed, you'll find his ring of keys.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I unlock the oak door?
1. The iron key in the officer's room to the west unlocks the oak door.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I unlock the cell doors in the north/south hallway?
1. In the library you will find some keys on a table that will unlock both cell doors.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I unlock the torture chamber cell door?
1. If you LOOK in the room where the torture chamber guard is killed, you'll find his ring of keys (which can open the cell door).

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I unlock the chest in the treasury?
1. The steel key found in the minotaur's room will unlock the chest.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What does the gold ring do when I WEAR it?
1. The secret is hinted at when you READ the ring.
2. You should keep an eye on your general health for another clue.
3. This is a ring of regeneration; it will slowly heal your injuries when you WEAR it.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I use the fireball wand?
1. You must first READY it as a weapon, then ATTACK one of your enemies.
2. The trigger word is one of the four elements.
3. The trigger word is FIRE.
